ygData.subject: Time to rest.
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis felt himself tremble as he was lifted off the ground. Put me down, I m busy here. He reached back to give her a tap and noticed she wasn t there. He

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


Veratis felt himself tremble as he was lifted off the ground. "Put me down,
I'm busy here." He reached back to give her a tap and noticed she wasn't
there. He looked back and saw her concentration. "What are you doing?" he
transformed to bat mode and started to flap his wings. he flew higher then
behind her to land. "You'll never gain control if you keep playing." He'd
suspected this possability since she started moving her protoform. "Now go
take a nap and I'll get back to you in the morning." Hetransformed back to
robot mode stepped back to his computer and went back to work.

"Such disrespect for her creator humph." he thought, "Lady Hawk would've
never shown such disrespect to me."

In the makeshift training room Lunarpine and Foxfingers traded barbs and
tags as they worked. A call came through over the link. "Time for a little
Rejuvination." Veratis' voice chimed in a commanding way to the two bots.
Lunarpine stopped running as he listened. Foxfingers lunged forward trying
to take advantage of the wolfs vulnerable state. Lunarpine spun and caught
the fox in mid leap. "Nice try Fox, to bad I'm just a little to smart for
that. Foxfingers transformed back to robot mode, "Look down." Lunarpine did
as the fox requested and saw a detonator attached to his waist. "Tag Wolfy"
the fox taunted "I win." Lunarpine dropped the fox pestered by the
detonator. He pulled it off and tossed it back to the fox. "Not to bad, I'll
know better next time." he left the room and proceeded to the quarters that
Veratis had assigned to him. Foxfingers returned to his and retired for the
night.

Veratis stretched his wings again as he stepped in his chamber. He'd been
working far to much for an old bot, he needed rest badly, He'd have plenty
of time to work in the morning. He looked back toward the lab remembering
the samples Foxfingers had brought from the maximals. He still didn't know
about the fox's adventure in the Predacon base. He thought about Lady Hawk,
wherever she was she was in trouble or she'd have returned by now.
